amendment.description: Amendment allows funds in the bill to be used for CPR training in schools.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 107-69 to allow funding under Title IV to be used for CPR training in schools.

action.text: Amendment (A002) offered by Mrs. Lois Capps.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Capps amendment (A002) Agreed to by recorded vote: 421 - 2 (Roll no. 128).
